pages.title: Giant Clam
pages.text: The giant clams are the members of the clam genus Tridacna that are the largest living bivalve mollusks.$(br2)Tridacna gigas is one of the most endangered clam species.$(br2)Antonio Pigafetta documented these in his journal as early as 1521.

pages.title: Giant Clam
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: None$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
